title: Calories in Four Egg Whites
meta_description: Discover calories in four egg white, including protein, carbs, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Large egg whites (~33 g each), separated from yolks, raw or poached, no added salt or ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by egg size, brand, and preparation method; values are approximate. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: Four large egg whites provide ~68 kcal and ~14 g protein with negligible fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp sugar per egg white for meringue
Cooked with 1 tsp oil per two whites

faqs.q: How many calories in one egg white?
faqs.a: About 17 kcal for one large egg white.

faqs.q: What is the protein in four egg whites?

faqs.a: No cholesterol in egg whites; it's all in the yolk.

faqs.q: Calories in four egg whites vs. whole eggs?
faqs.a: Four egg whites: ~68 kcal; four whole eggs: ~288 kcal (due to yolks).
Yes, only ~0.8 g carbs in four egg whites, mostly sugars.
